entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning after midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
